Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the invertebrate defensin family (Type 1 subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Protozoan:Procyclic trypanosomes (IC50=10 µM).Gram-negative bacteria:Sodalis (IC50=2 µM)，Escherichia coli DH5α (IC50=0.2 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial peptide mostly active against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.

Literature.Title: Tsetse immune responses and trypanosome transmission implications for the development of tsetse-based strategies to reduce trypanosomiasis.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2001 Oct 23;98(22)12648-12653.
Literature.Author: Hao Z, Kasumba I, Lehane MJ, Gibson WC, Kwon J, Aksoy S.

Literature.Title: Immunopeptides in the defense reactions of Glossina morsitans to bacterial and Trypanosoma brucei brucei infections.
Literature.Author: Boulanger N, Brun R, Ehret-Sabatier L, Kunz C, Bulet P.

Literature.Title: Tsetse immune responses and trypanosome transmission: implications for the development of tsetse-based strategies to reduce trypanosomiasis.
Literature.Author: Kwon J.,Gibson W.C.,Lehane M.J.,Kasumba I.,Hao Z.
